overview: A visually stunning aerial journey throughout the American Southwest with Robert Fulton, filmmaker/pilot extraordinaire accompanied with a mystical soundtrack by Joakin Bello. Never has there been such a diverse and highly original view of an America that is mysterious and spiritual. Visit the high desert plateaus, the river canyons and Rocky Mountain wind-swept peaks with Fulton as he takes your breath away and renews your sense of timelessness.
title: Geography of Hope
